entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind light except north 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
